title: Change notification rules
content:
Service Management sends an email notification to designated users when a business rule triggers a notification event. The following sections describe the notifications. The default business rules define the recipients according to the user or group identified in the change record, but an administrator must first do the following:

  • Assign the appropriate Change Management roles to the named users.
  • Populate groups with users who also have the appropriate roles to add, change, or update change records.

All change types

New change

Template Recipients Content Notes
Template definition for change has been opened
  • Service owner
  • Requested by person
  • Change Manager Group members
  • Change title
  • ID
  • Service
  • Category
  • Description
  • Justification
 Confirmation of new change record created.

Comment added

Template Recipients Content Notes
New comment added
  • Change owner
  • Change Manager Group members
  • All commenters
  • Change title
  • ID
  • Last three comments with avatars
 Confirmation of new comment

Emergency changes

Enters Build and test phase

Template Recipients Content Notes
Template definition for change has been opened

If Reported by person is blank:

  • Change Manager Group members

Otherwise:

  • Reported by person
  • Change title
  • ID
  • Service
  • Category
  • Description
  • Justification
 Confirmation Build and test phase reached.

 From ECAB to Plan. Confirmation approval for change denied.

 From ECAB to Execute. Change is part of a release, and is the last change to be approved among all the release changes.
